name: Sea emperor
description:
Welcome to the game "Sea Emperor: These Nessel bastards will pay for polluting my home".  You shoot harpoons, lack spoons and try to take down a company named Nessel who uses the ocean as their trashcan. This bullet hell game is essentially infinite. You'll encounter several enemies and items. 

This game's message is about we need to all work together fix pollution and other water scarcity issues given that you cannot win in this singleplayer game. Good luck!

Controls:

WASD/ARROW KEY/ RIGHT STICK = movement

YX/C/V/B/N/M/E/controller facebutton left/right = shooting

Mouse = navigating through menus

Music credits:
